description: This file defines the React component 'HabitsPage', which serves as the main interface for managing habits in a habit tracker application. It includes local state for modal visibility and editing mode, retrieves global app state and actions via hooks, and renders a list of habit cards with options to add, edit, archive, or delete habits. It also manages the display of loading states and a modal form for habit creation and editing.

methods.name: HabitsPage()
methods.description: React functional component that provides the user interface for creating, editing, archiving, and deleting habits. Handles local state for modal controls and editing context, and coordinates global state actions and selectors.
